(Simplified: 矾)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 樊 indicates the sound; 石 (mineral) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 樊 [ fán ] railing, fence, enclosed place
    • 石 [ shí ] stone, rock, mineral
①含水複鹽的一類，是某些金屬硫酸鹽的含水結晶。最常見的是“明礬”，亦稱“白礬”。

礬字的基本解释

礬
fán
见“矾”。

礬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fán］
［《廣韻》附袁切，平元，奉。］
“矾1”的繁体字。
(1)矾石。某些金属硫酸盐的含水结晶，可入药。有白、青、黄、黑、绛五种。白色的俗称明矾。
(2)用胶矾水浸湿或洗刷生纸或生绢，使之能吸水适度，便于书画，叫作“矾”。
(3)山矾花的简称。山矾花，俗名椗花。花白而香，叶密枝肥，木高数尺。

礬字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　礬； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页838第25
【廣韻】附袁切【集韻】【韻會】符袁切，?音煩。礬石。【山海經】女牀山，其隂多涅石。【郭註】礬石也。楚人名涅石，秦人名羽涅。【韻會】一名羽澤，有靑白黃黑絳五種。　又山礬，花名。【正字通】俗名椗花，木高數尺，葉密枝肥，冬不凋，花白而香。一名瑒花。黃庭堅曰：江南野中椗花，土人採葉燒灰，染紫爲黝，不借礬而成。因易名爲山礬。韻會譌爲鄭花，且云卽唐玉蘂花，謬也。

alum
Basic explanation of words
alum
fán
See "Alum".
alum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fán］
["Guang Yun" with Yuan Qi, Ping Yuan, Feng. ]
The traditional characters of "瑪1".
(1) Alumite. The hydrated crystals of certain metal sulfates can be used as medicine. There are five types: white, blue, yellow, black, and crimson. White commonly known as alum.
(2) Soak or wash raw paper or raw silk with alum water to make it absorb water moderately, which is convenient for painting and calligraphy. It is called "alum".
(3) The abbreviation of Symplocos acuminata. Mountain viburnum, commonly known as imitation flower. The flowers are white and fragrant, the leaves are dense and the branches are fertilizer, and the wood is several feet high.
alum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　 alum; Kangxi strokes: 20; page number: page 838 to 25
[Guang Yun] with Yuan Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Fu Yuan Qi, sound trouble. Alumite. 【Shan Hai Jing】Nv Bed Mountain, its Yin Dornier stone. [Guo's Note] Alumite is also. The name of Chu is Nirvana, and the name of Qin is Yuni. [Rhyme Club] A Yuze has five types: white, yellow, black and crimson.　And alum, flower name. [Zhengzitong] The common name is 碇花, the wood is a few feet high, the leaves are dense and the branches are fat, and the flowers are white and fragrant without withering in winter. A Yuanhua. Huang Tingjian said: The wild flowers in the south of the Yangtze River, the natives picked leaves and burned ashes, dyed purple for tan, and made them without alum. Changed its name to Symplocos alum. Yun Huizheng is Zheng Hua, and Yunyu Tang Yurui Hua is absurd.
